Positive Reviews:
I had stayed here last year also but then the conditions were bad. The air conditioning at the time was very poor and I had to put in requests for it to be rectified. However, it was a pleasant surprise to see that the issue had been resolved. They are refurbishing, I think, and there are signs of it. But, some of the furnishers need replacing. 

Maybe it was one off, but it happened that my flight was delayed and I wanted to update the reception about my arrival time. No one ever picked up the phone as I tried desperately from the airport The number was correct as proved later and I had obtained it from Booking.com portal at the time of booking. I even called a friend to inform the hotel reception but it was not possible to connect. A major negative! The staff is generally welcoming. The breakfast was better but lacked the vow factor, The room was well kept and clean. The elevators have obnoxious mirrors all around which is awful specially if you are sharing the ride with families, it feels really odd.

The restaurant is the worst place I've eaten in Riyadh, yet somehow more expensive than most places. The food was terrible & service was even worse. 

Wouldn't recommend unfortunately, which is a shame because we need a consistent hotel to stay at for work.

Review Title: Big Rooms, Good Location, but not pleasant
Negative Reviews:
Old Furniture, Curtain, feels like you are in broken house, though it is clean.  Only paper cups are available for Drinking Hot Tea/Coffee. 
Main problem is , I struggled to charge my laptop and phones, because the Electric Plug is not compatible. They did not help to get International plug converter. If you do not have a Saudi compatible Mobile/Laptop chargers, you cannot charge; be ready to struggle. It is a place, where international travelers would often visit. How they can expect everyone to bring Saudi Compatible plugs !?

Review Title: Bad reception, they changed my room 3 times, all of them had cold water.
Negative Reviews: The water was extremely cold, I got there at 5PM December, I called reception, they sent someone that couldn't do anything. They then changed my room to antoher room with cold water, after calling them, same thing happened, the guy they sent didn't do anything then they sent me to a THIRD room with COLD water, by that time it was 8PM and I had to sleep because there was no way I could shower because it would get me sick. This was the suite with the Jaccuzi that cost over 800 Riyals/night.
